node.title: Beliive
node.excerpt: World's largest time bank, empowering people to recognize abundance by living new experiences one hour at a time.

node.excerpt: Joint Idea is a synergy platform that cultivates consciousness, creativity, and serendipity by connecting ideas, people, place, and time.

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation

node.title: 2021 Review, 2022 Preview

node.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

node.title: Your December 8 Titan Update
node.excerpt: We’re in the midst of shipping a large batch of Titans to North America, and we’re expanding our partner network.

node.title: Your November 22 Titan Update

node.title: August 18 AMA Recap
node.excerpt: Sharing the recording of yesterday's AMA where we discussed farming, the token, TF Grid use cases, and TF Grid 3.0.

node.title: ThreeFold Community Call Next Tuesday
node.excerpt: We'd like to invite the community for a call to catch up on all things ThreeFold next Tuesday April 19th.

node.title: Today is Earth Day!
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, we believe in "Planet First." Take a look at some of the ways ThreeFold is acting to positively impact the planet.

node.title: What's Possible on Grid 2

node.title: Grid V2 to V3 Migration Update
node.excerpt: Since we are now live on TF Grid 3.0, it is important that all farmers who are still on Grid 2.x migrate their farms to the newest mainnet.

node.title: Happy Holidays!
node.excerpt: Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

node.title: Join us at the virtual Horizon Cloud Summit
node.excerpt: ThreeFold will be presenting two sessions at the Horizon Cloud Summit on December 8 and 9.

node.title: A Conversation with Jeroen Douglas
node.excerpt: An enlightening conversation between ThreeFold co-founder Weynand Kuijpers and Solidaridad Network (ThreeFold partner) Executive Director Jeroen Douglas.

node.title: Liquid Hacked, TFT Not Affected
node.excerpt: Liquid, an exchange on which TFT is listed, has been hacked. It appears TFT was not affected.

node.title: Liquid Receives $120 Million in Debt Financing From FTX
node.excerpt: The owner and operator of top tier exchange FTX finances Liquid and enters discussions around further collaboration.

node.title: Your Mid November Titan Update
node.excerpt: We’ve shipped 90% of all European orders that were placed up until early November, and later this month, we’ll begin shipping to the Americas.

node.title: Announcing the November 2020 community call
node.excerpt: Mark your calendars! Next Monday November 2nd at 5pm CET we will host a 30-minute community call to update you on exciting progress and to show you what we’ll be working towards in the coming months.

node.title: ThreeFold's October 2020 community update is here
node.excerpt: It’s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month – an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more! Find the link to the full update within!

node.title: ThreeFold Coverage in Crypto Daily

node.title: Satoshi Street Bets x ThreeFold AMA
node.excerpt: Some of the team joined Satoshi Street Bets for an Ask Me Anything with their community. Listen to the recording!

node.title: September 1 Community Call Announcement
node.excerpt: We'll host a community call this Wednesday at 5pm CEST with updates on farming and TF Grid 3.0!

node.title: A First Look at Terraform on TF Grid 3.0
node.excerpt: A demo on how easy it is to create, use, and destroy deployments on TF Grid 3.0 using Terraform.

node.title: ThreeFold on Corporate Unplugged Podcast
node.excerpt: ThreeFold co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer appeared on the Corporate Unplugged podcast, with previous guests Simon Sinek and Seth Godin.

node.title: Presenting the new Explorer UI for Grid 3.x
node.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.

node.title: ThreeFold @ Odyssey Momentum 2020!

node.excerpt: We began shipping Titans to Europe last week, but we still need information from many farmers.

node.title: Seeking participation with the TFT plan

node.title: Validator Node Update
node.excerpt: In support of the establishment of ThreeFold’s DAO we have officially opened registrations for the first L2 and L0 validators.

node.title: ThreeFold to Attend World Blockchain Summit Dubai
node.excerpt: Some of the team will be attending World Blockchain Summit in Dubai this week as exhibitors.

node.title: ThreeFold & WaykiChain collaborate to decentralize cloud computing
node.excerpt: Today, ThreeFold and WaykiChain are pleased to officially announce their collaborative partnership..

node.title: Connecting the Dots: ThreeFold plans to scale globally
node.excerpt: ThreeFold started as an idea about ten years ago and is now manifesting itself into the most comprehensive peer-to-peer Internet and cloud infrastructure in the world. The potential of our technology to revolutionize digitization globally is endless and limited only to our collective imagination.

node.title: Welcome to the Internet of Internets
node.excerpt: Together, we’re building our own future through the Internet of Internets – decentralized, open, inclusive, regenerative, and resilient.

node.title: Co-Realizing the Promise
node.excerpt: Together with our global community, we're realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people.

node.title: Stake TFT and Become a ThreeFold Validator
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people. Anyone can become a validator and participate in the decentralization of the Internet economy.

node.title: Into the Fold – The ThreeFold Movement
node.excerpt: It's not by mistake that you're here, reading this post. You can feel that a global shift is happening. And you want to do something about it.

node.title: ThreeFold Weekly! March 29th, 2022 (Vol 12)
node.excerpt: Welcome to the 12th edition of of ThreeFold Weekly. Let’s take a look at what happened in the ThreeFold universe last week.

node.title: ThreeFold Weekly! June 15th, 2022 (Vol 21)
node.excerpt: Welcome to the 21st edition of ThreeFold Weekly. It’s been a big week! Let’s take a quick look at the latest happenings within the ThreeFold universe.

node.title: ThreeFold Weekly! May 10th, 2022 (Vol 17)
node.excerpt: Welcome to the 17th edition of ThreeFold Weekly. Let’s dive into last week’s highlights throughout the ThreeFold ecosystem.
